alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 29 at 9:27AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER. ...AVALANCHE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9:00 AM THURSDAY UNTIL MIDNIGHT... ... * WHAT...The Avalanche Danger is HIGH (Level 4 of 5) * WHERE...Elk Mountains south of the divide, West Elk Mountains, Grand Mesa, and areas around Monarch Pass * WHEN...In effect from 8:00 AM Thursday, December 29 until Midnight. * IMPACTS...Heavy snow and strong winds have created dangerous avalanche conditions in the backcountry. Large and dangerous avalanches will be very easy to trigger. Avalanches will run naturally. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...Travel in backcountry avalanche terrain is not recommended. Avoid travel on and under slopes steeper than about 30 degrees. You can find more detailed information at colorado.gov/avalanche.
